summary: adds coffins and player chests to vampie lairs around skyrim curently only mara eye pond den but i am working on the other lairs its just i am new to the ck so i have a hard time learning it
descriptionHtml:
adds cofins and player chests to vampie lairs around skyrim curently only mara eye pond den but i am working on the other lairs its just i am new to the ck so i have a hard time learning it

oh btw it requires dawnguard

also sorry for my english speling my dislektia makes that hapan(see)

WARNING if you have downloaded version 1.1 it is VERY bugged redownload 1.0) FIXED
